sources.description:
It's FRIDAY@PizzaFLIX

Stars: Audie Murphy, L.Q. Jones, Michael Dante, Linda Lawson
üçï New HD 4K RESTORATION from the Original Negativeüçï 
Experience a tense and action-filled Western directed by veteran filmmaker William Witney. Set in the rugged Arizona Territory, this 1964 CinemaScope feature stars Audie Murphy as Capt. Jeff Stanton, a tough but principled Army officer, assigned to suppress a growing Apache uprising. As conflict escalates, Stanton must confront not only the violence on the frontier but also his own changing beliefs about justice and peace.

This fast-paced Western also stars Michael Dante as the proud Apache leader, and Linda Lawson as the strong-willed missionary‚Äôs daughter caught in the crossfire. Adding grit to the cast is L.Q. Jones‚Äîlater a frequent face in Sam Peckinpah‚Äôs legendary posse‚Äîbringing classic frontier toughness to the screen.

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

A standout entry in the final era of traditional Hollywood Westerns, this production delivers compelling performances and cinematic style. Whether you‚Äôre a fan of Audie Murphy‚Äôs filmography or a student of 1960s Westerns, this restored presentation brings the frontier back to life.
